description: Creamy goats cheese, sweet capsicums and crisp puff pastry work perfectly together in this simple tart.
keywords: Vegetable pie & tart,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Christmas,Tree nut free,Egg,Sesame free,Summer,Peanut free
name: Roasted Red Capsicum & Goats Cheese Tart Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 red capsicums, red, yellow and green, sliced
2 red onions, peeled and chopped into thin wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the grill to high. Grill the capsicums for 8 minutes, turning frequently, until blackened. Place the capsicum in a large bowl, cover with clingfilm and set aside for 20 minutes. Peel away the skin, discard and slice into strips.
Heat half of the oil in a large, deep, non-stick pan on medium heat and cook the onions for 8-10 minutes. Add the capsicum and oregano and cook for 5 minutes.
Pre-heat the oven to 180Â°C. Unroll the pastry and place on a lightly oiled baking sheet. Cut a border of 2cm and pile the onion and capsicum mix in the middle. Top with slices of goats cheese.
Brush the edges with beaten egg, drizzle with oil and bake for 15 minutes until puffy and golden.
